name: ASTROMECH
description:
Welcome to the world of Astromech!

In Astromech, you'll play as a  salvage robot, or astromech, who must meet their salvage quota and still make a profit. Fly around the debris field and find every item on your salvage list, but remember to keep track of your fuel expenditures, space-gas is expensive, so you've gotta move fast!

Made for MechJamIII

Optional Themes :

No Weapons Allowed
